title: Wills And Ways

[[=]]
> //Earn whatever you have taken//
> //Take whatever you have earned//
> //Still and softer, lightly shaken//
> //Golden brown or lightly burned//
> 
> //Nothing new has been mistaken//
> //Nothing old is turned anew//
> //On the morning we awaken//
> //Salutations et adieux//

[[=]]
> //I have been harmed, by rich men, with sharp knives, through the corridors of the soul.//
> //I will kill, by poor men, and dull blades, through the corner of the eye.//
> //I have my principles.//
> //And I forgive those unprincipled against me.//
> //Lest the sword of Damocles fall -//
> //And fucking kill me.//
[[/=]]
